message.content:
I need to identify the specific line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and to deliver goods and services to customers in the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, these costs would typically be captured under "Selling Expenses" since this category generally includes costs related to marketing, sales, distribution, and other customer-facing activities that are incurred to secure orders and deliver products/services.

In the income statement provided, I can see:
```
Selling Expenses | 1461486.34 | 2024-02-05
```

This line item represents the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services to customers.

{"solution": {'value': '1461486.34'}}
